title: Naruto
description: A young ninja seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village leader.

title: One Piece
description: A young pirate named Luffy and his crew search for the ultimate treasure known as One Piece.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid creatures known as Titans.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it.

title: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where most people have superpowers, a boy without them strives to become a hero.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game and must fight to survive.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: A group of bounty hunters travels through space in their quest to capture the galaxy's most wanted criminals.

title: One Punch Man
description: A superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch struggles with boredom and finding a worthy fight.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: The adventures of Goku as he defends Earth from powerful foes while searching for the Dragon Balls.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: Teenagers pilot giant mechs to protect Earth from mysterious beings known as Angels.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a horrific encounter and must navigate his new life.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends accidentally discovers time travel and must deal with the consequences.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: A young boy becomes a Hunter to find his father, who is also a legendary Hunter.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: A young boy becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his demon-turned sister.

title: Hellsing
description: An organization dedicated to protecting England from supernatural threats is led by an immortal vampire.

title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
description: A young man gains the power to command anyone and uses it to fight against an oppressive empire.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: A young psychic with immense power struggles with his emotions and the challenges of adolescence.

title: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World
description: A young man is transported to another world where he discovers he can return to life upon death.

title: Gintama
description: Set in an alternate-history Edo period where aliens have invaded Japan, this series follows the adventures of Gintoki Sakata, a freelancer.

title: Black Clover
description: Two orphans, Asta and Yuno, aim to become the Wizard King in a world where magic is everything.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description: The Joestar family is cursed to fight supernatural forces across generations in this action-packed series.

title: Kakegurui
description: In a high-stakes gambling academy, a new transfer student shakes things up with her incredible gambling skills.

title: Toradora!
description: A high school romance between two students with difficult personalities and a shared goal to help each other with their crushes.

title: Clannad
description: A touching story about a troubled high school student and the impact he has on those around him.

title: Made in Abyss
description: A young girl and a robot descend into a mysterious abyss to find her mother, facing many dangers along the way.

title: No Game No Life
description: A brother and sister duo are transported to a world where everything is decided by games and aim to defeat the mysterious beings ruling the world.

title: Angel Beats!
description: In a purgatory-like afterlife, a group of deceased students fights against a mysterious girl with supernatural powers.

title: The Promised Neverland
description: Children in an orphanage discover the dark truth about their seemingly perfect life and must plan their escape.

title: Naruto Shippuden
description: The sequel to Naruto, following the adventures of Naruto Uzumaki as he continues his journey to become the Hokage and protect his friends.
